TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content: 8 to go!
61 away from light green group!
12 until my first light green ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Not far enough and too near ; ) pun-a-not intended ; )
80 To go!
5 till the next rank, 55 till my third bar!
Ooh! I've got 9 points left until my fourth bar! Super excited! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

> 
> Ooh! I've got 9 points left until my fourth bar! Super excited! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Oooh, new profile picture! Nice!

Just reached my third WAAY earlier than i expected - Thanks Roflcopterkklol!
Too far, I think. The idea of reputation ranks seems cool to me.

I only have 31 left till my next rank, so not too long, assuming I come up with stuff that funny enough to be rep worthy...

Were you expecting a joke here?

56 points until my third bar.

Too bad nobody helps me........

sarcasm
